description:
YES! YES! YES!
These walls have seen Harley fuck a lot of hot young asses. And now the tables have turned.
Harley gets fucked! By Cooper!
"Wow, this has been a long time coming," I said.
"Yeah, it has," Harley said, smiling.
"What made you finally decide to do it?" I asked. "To take it up the ass?"
"It looked like it felt good," Harley said. "I'd been thinking about it for a while, but couldn't quite get myself to do it."
"You're going to make a lot of people very happy," I told Harley. "Including me," I thought to myself.
He just smiled. But I couldn't wait to see his hot hole popped.
Cooper was awesome. His interaction with Harley was intense and nurturing. He wanted to make Harley's first time an unforgettable experience...
title: Harley Gets Fucked!
